Name: Saving Mei
About the game: This is a survival game You will save our hero Mei At the weekend, Mei and some friends came to an island The sun is shining and they all have fun However, when they were having fun, they were attacked by some undead Can Mei survive the enemy's encirclement and suppression? In the process of fighting with the enemy, you should not only survive yourself, but also save your best friend Can you protect your best friend? --- Game play Fight: Kill all enemies and monsters Build: build your own house Planting: Planting all kinds of plants to obtain food necessary for survival Fishing: all kinds of fish Breeding: breeding various animals, etc Collection: logging, mining, etc More content is waiting for your exploration --- Just alive Facing all difficulties Find a way to live
Meta Title: Saving Mei: Mar 5, 2023, SavingM and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Saving Mei? Check out the release date (Mar 5, 2023), developer insights from SavingM, and a complete game summary.
